message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.HC 

This paper deals with markerless motion capture, which involves computer vision and graphics techniques to estimate 3D human motion and body shape from multi-view video. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves segmentation, which falls under cs.GR (Graphics). The use of a CNN method suggests cs.MM (Multimedia), while the use of a temporal prior suggests cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper also discusses the potential applications of the proposed method in creating realistic 3D shape avatars, which falls under cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
